> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift stays with Polarclaw and finds the snow to be rather cold under
> his paws.  He comically shakes the snow from his paws as he walks.
>
> " Now I know why cats hate water.  Talk about cold feet.  Slag, I sure got
> those all right."

<NEW>

"It's only going to get colder." WOLFGANG said as he chuckled from the
rear as he bound up the path after them in his wolf beast mode, his
tail wagging eagerly.

And it did get colder as they climbed up the path as it swung around
the back side of the mountain. At times it got incredibly narrow where
each one had to walk carefully, one after another, at others it was
wide enough that POLAR CLAW and NIGHTSHIFT could walk shoulder to
shoulder.

After several hours though they finally make it to the top of the pass
where PROWL was waiting for them. He was shaking his head, clearing
some snow that had settled on it, it was beginning to snow lightly
here at the higher elevation.

Over the other side of the mountain there was the long path leading
back down and a large beautiful lake. It's crystal clear waters
perfectly reflecting the skies and landscape around it. In the center
of it, sitting on what appeared to be a small island sat that tall
tower that was CRYONOSIS.

"Look." PROWL said as he pointed with a wing over at the tower.

Looking at the lake itself hundreds of feet back down the mountain,
one could see where there use to be a bridge that crossed the lake
from the tower to the mainland, but it was largely destroyed. Only
small sections of it remained standing precariously out of the water.
It could not be used to cross it.

Then there was the tower itself. It looked to be made of some sort of
blue and white materials, stone and metal that were once fused
harmoniously together. Now however there were cracks and holes that
marred its once pristine surface as if blasted apart by weapons fire.

Even the defensive weapons that had just recently fired at the shuttle
looked damaged even if still functional as they swayed in the winds
that were picking up.

"Slag" said the normally silent RAMULUS as the snow was beginning to
fall a little harder.


(TAG)

Preston
